item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: st_demo_admin
item.content:encoded:
[home_marketing_content]

Built by Professionals, for Professionals

Experience is the best teacher, and we've got loads of it. We're an award-winning creative team with over 5 years of real-world Wordpress site-building experience. You won't find needless functions "just because they're cool". We've built this theme using our real-world experiences as the driving force behind every decision we've made. [/icon] [icon style="icon-shield-green" url="http://themes.truethemes.net/Sterling/features/top-notch-customer-support" target="_self"] Amazing Support Our dedicated support team is here to serve all of your support needs. I am a complete novice and was met with a level of service and support I have never encountered to date...[/testimonial] [testimonial client="ThemeForest Customer 2"]I have downloaded 8 themes from themeforest. This has been the easiest to customize out of them all. Premium Wordpress Theme by TrueThemes

Hi, weâre Truethemes. Weâre a Faith-based design agency that creates Professional Wordpress Themes. Weâre smart, talented and super passionate about our work. We used to work at the offices of much larger ad agencies. We were billing clients silly amounts of money to create amazing work for them, but itâs no longer the big accounts that get us excited. We've got over 5 years of experience building real world Wordpress powered websites. Our vast experience enables us to build professional Wordpress themes that not only look great, but also provide the functionality and usability that every successful website absolutely needs.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: st_demo_admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Sterling comes packed with over 100+ Powerful Shortcodes. Boo-yah!
Gallery items are easily added using Sterling's built-in Gallery post type.
Gallery items are easily added using Sterling's built-in Gallery post type.

item.title: Admin Options Panel
item.dc:creator: st_demo_admin
item.content:encoded: [text style="large-callout"] Sterling features an amazingly powerful Site Options Panel. The extensive array of options combined with the familiar WordPress user interface make this the most usable options panel you've ever experienced. It also comes completely white label, so your clients will think you're an absolute rockstar! [/text] [pagination_links] [next url="http://themes.truethemes.net/Sterling/features/18-page-templates" link_text="18 Page Templates â"] [/pagination_links]

item.title: 18 Page Templates
item.dc:creator: st_demo_admin
item.content:encoded: [text style="large-callout"] Sterling is one of the most robust themes available on the market today. Each of the 18 Page Templates were born from our 5 years of real-world Wordpress site building experience. We've already solved the problems that you're going to face during your website build. Purchase this theme with the confidence in knowing that this theme comes with everything you need to run a successful website. [/text] [pagination_links] [previous url="http://themes.truethemes.net/Sterling/features/admin-options-panel" link_text="â Admin Options Panel"] [next url="http://themes.truethemes.net/Sterling/features/professional-site-design" link_text="Theme Designer â"] [/pagination_links]

item.title: Theme Designer
item.dc:creator: st_demo_admin
item.content:encoded: [text style="large-callout"] Sterling comes packed with the all new Theme Designer. It's an easy-to-use design tool that's built directly into the custom Options Panel. Theme Designer enables you to customize every single design element of your theme. Stand out from the crowd with your very own custom design. [/text] [pagination_links] [previous url="http://themes.truethemes.net/Sterling/features/18-page-templates" link_text="â 18 Page Templates"] [next url="http://themes.truethemes.net/Sterling/features/visual-shortcode-manager" link_text="Visual Shortcode Manager â"] [/pagination_links]

item.title: Intuitive Page Editing
item.dc:creator: st_demo_admin
item.content:encoded: [text style="large-callout"] Sterling comes with a simple yet very powerful functionality. Users of all levels can now easily edit the content directly from their Wordpress site. Simply login and browse the site just as a normal user would. Once you find the page or post you'd like to edit simply click the Edit button and you'll be taken to the Visual Content Editor within the Dashboard. [/text] [pagination_links] [previous url="http://themes.truethemes.net/Sterling/features/visual-shortcode-manager" link_text="â Visual Shortcode Manager"] [next url="http://themes.truethemes.net/Sterling/features/custom-post-types" link_text="Custom Post Types â"] [/pagination_links]

item.title: Visual Form Builder
item.dc:creator: st_demo_admin
item.content:encoded: [text style="large-callout"] Sterling comes with an amazingly powerful Visual Form Builder. You can now create advanced contact forms with only a few clicks of the mouse. The intuitive drag-and-drop functionality combined with the familiar WordPress Interface make this form builder an absolute breeze to use. All received messages get automatically backed up right within the WordPress Dashboard. [/text] [pagination_links] [previous url="http://themes.truethemes.net/Sterling/features/custom-post-types" link_text="â Custom Post Types"] [next url="http://themes.truethemes.net/Sterling/features/stock-photos-icons" link_text="Stock Photos & Icons â"] [/pagination_links]

item.title: Custom Post Types
item.dc:creator: st_demo_admin
item.content:encoded: [text style="large-callout"] Sterling takes full advantage of Wordpress' all new Custom Post Types. We've taken the default Wordpress functionality to a whole new level by adding a variety of intuitive point-and-click Post Types. Don't be fooled by other themes that have all the bells and whistles but are practically impossible to figure out. Our intuitive Post Types make certain that this theme will absolutely be one of the most user-friendly themes you've ever experienced.
